summary: Email correspondence between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding the exchange of discovery materials and coordination on proposed redactions to motions in limine (MILs) in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The emails discuss sending an encrypted hard drive with recent productions to Maxwell at MDC and preparing a joint letter for the court.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell from Cohen & Gresser LLP, coordinating with prosecutors on discovery productions and proposed redactions to motions in limine.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Cc'd on emails regarding discovery and redactions, part of Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Cc'd on emails regarding discovery and redactions, part of Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused, incarcerated at MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center), to whom discovery materials on an encrypted hard drive are being sent.

connections.description: Everdell is coordinating the delivery of discovery materials to Maxwell at MDC and working on legal strategy regarding redactions.
Pagliuca is cc'd on legal correspondence regarding Maxwell's case, indicating his role on the defense team.
Menninger is cc'd on legal correspondence regarding Maxwell's case, indicating her role on the defense team.
Both are defense attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell, copied on the same case-related emails.

events.title: Coordination on Discovery and Redactions
events.description: Email exchange between defense and prosecution regarding sending discovery materials to Maxwell and preparing a joint letter on proposed redactions to motions in limine.

events.title: Discovery Production
events.description: A discovery production (spreadsheets) was made, referenced as part of materials to be loaded onto the hard drive for Maxwell.

events.title: 3500 and Discovery Productions
events.description: Productions included 3500 material (containing TW and NTW productions and updated indices) and discovery (AIC, AT&T, VR birth certificate).

events.title: GX and Discovery Productions
events.description: Productions included GX materials (GXs 14, 16, 416-B and updated index) and various other discovery materials.

locations: New York, NY 10022 (Cohen & Gresser LLP address)
keyFacts: Discovery materials from October 13, 25, and 28, 2021, were being sent to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC via an encrypted 1TB hard drive.
The parties were coordinating on proposed redactions to motions in limine (MILs) under a court order to file a joint letter by October 29, 2021.
The defense specifically requested that McAfee encryption software not be used on the drive due to technical problems.
The email chain shows active case management and evidence exchange between prosecution and defense shortly before Maxwell's trial.
